task.title: Omelette
task.shortdesc: Here is how you make an omelette.

taskbody.prereq:
You will need these ingreidents.
3 Eggs
Silken Tofu
1/2 bag of Bacon Bits
1/2 cup of Black Beans
Diced tomatoes
1/4 cup of Mushrooms
1/4 cup of diced peppers
1 cup Provolone Cheese
1/4 cup hummus

step.cmd: Add fillings to a medium sauce pan.
Sautee omelette fillings until all are cooked.
While the fillings are cooking, crack the eggs into a different saucepan.
While the fillings are cooking, lay the silken tofu in the pan
Heat the pan to low-to-medium heat.
Once the fillings are cooked and the omelette is warmed, add fillings on to half of the pan with the omelette.
With a spatula, flip the empty side of the omelette over the side with the fillings.
Remove omelette from pan, and place it onto a plate. Enjoy!
